section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have a judgment of the Court to announce in 72-5881, Marshall against the United States and for reasons stated in a written opinion filed this morning, the judgment under review of is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Marshall with whom Mr. Justice Douglas and Justice Brennan joined filed a dissenting opinion.
